alert.note: Alert for Burke; Columbia; McDuffie; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 6:25PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern McDuffie, central Columbia, northwestern Burke and Richmond Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 625 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harlem, or 8 miles east of Thomson, moving southeast at 25 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Strom Thurmond Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Thomson, Martinez, Fort Gordon, Augusta, Hephzibah, Harlem, Glendale, Gough, South Augusta, Midtown, Summerville, Augusta Mall, Daniel Field, Augusta Regional Airport, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Augusta National Golf Club, McBean and Riverwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 179 and 201. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
